籤詩版本二:
Kufuneka uthethe ngokungafihlisiyo kwaye ukhumbule ukungafuni ezinye izakhono kwezinye iindawo.
Kufuneka ubambelele kubomi bakho obudala, akukho nto iyenye iya kukulungela
詩意:
Le hexagram luphawu lokugcinwa kunye nokufika ngexesha.
Ukugcina izinto ezindala kuya kuzisa amathamsanqa.
解曰: Phila kwaye uhlale. Inqweneleka kwaye iphumelele. Musa ukwenza enye into. Yiba nje ngononophelo.
籤詩故事一:
◇UKumkani uWen wacela ukuvumisa
UKumkani uWen weZhou Dynasty wayekwazi ukuvumisa. UKumkani uZhou wambiza ngelo xesha. UKumkani uWen wabala ukuba olu hambo lwaluneshwa kwaye lwaluza kuzisa iminyaka esixhenxe yamashwa, ngoko waxelela unyana wakhe wamazibulo, uBoyi, ukuba alawule uQi (igama yendawo) ngokomthetho kwaye ungaphumi ngaphandle.
Kamva, uKumkani u-Wen wavalelwa phantsi kwendlu kaKumkani uZhou e-Youli (igama lendawo).
Ngelo xesha, unyana omkhulu kaKumkani uWen waya kusindisa uyise, kodwa wabulawa ngenxa yokuba wayilibala imiyalelo kayise.
聖意: Ikhaya ngokwalo lidla ngokungathandekiyo, lifuna ubutyebi kunye nethamsanqa, ukuthengiselana, umtshato, umqobo, i-alamu ye-Liujia, i-Chi Tiansi, amanqaku amahlanu, umonakalo wemfuyo ezintandathu, abantu abalahlekileyo, ityala likawonkewonke, ilahleko, ukufuduka, ukulondolozwa, ukulahleka kwempahla, ukugula, okubi. isifo, Anshan ingcwaba kufuneka itshintshwe.
